parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Company ID in which the search needs to be performed

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search term for the user is matched based on the user full name, email or phone

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: No of results to be skipped before returning the result

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: No of results to be limited before returning the result

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Location ID in which the search needs to be performed

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the users to be filtered in the search

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Role of the users to be filtered in the search

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: List of User IDs to be filtered in the search

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field on which sort is applied in which the results need to be sorted. Default is based on the first and last name

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: The direction in which the results need to be sorted

bearer.name: Authorization
bearer.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Location-Access.name: Authorization
Location-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Agency-Access.name: Authorization
Agency-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Agency (OR) Private Integration Token of Agency.

message.example: Invalid token: access token is invalid

scopes.description: Scopes allowed for users. Only scopes that have been passed will be enabled. Note:- If passed empty all the scopes will be get disabled

scopesAssignedToOnly.description: Assigned Scopes allowed for users. Only scopes that have been passed will be enabled. If passed empty all the assigned scopes will be get disabled

email.description: Email update is no longer supported due to security reasons.

emailChangeOTP.description: OTP to change the email ID of the user

companyId.description: Company/Agency Id. Required for Agency Level access

scopes.description: Scopes allowed for users. Only scopes that have been passed will be enabled. If passed empty all the scopes will be get disabled

scopesAssignedToOnly.description: Assigned Scopes allowed for users. Only scopes that have been passed will be enabled. If passed empty all the assigned scopes will be get disabled

message.example: Queued deleting user with e-mail john@deo.com and name John Deo. Will take effect in a few minutes.
